${ModID}:IroncladKit.NAME: Ironclad Kit
${ModID}:IroncladKit.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Bash and *Strike to your hand. Exhaust.

${ModID}:SilentKit.NAME: Silent Kit
${ModID}:SilentKit.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Survivor and *Neutralize to your hand. Exhaust.

${ModID}:DefectKit.NAME: Defect Kit
${ModID}:DefectKit.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Zap and *Dualcast to your hand. Exhaust.

${ModID}:WatcherKit.NAME: Watcher Kit
${ModID}:WatcherKit.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Eruption and *Vigilance to your hand. Exhaust.

${ModID}:PackmasterKit.NAME: Packmaster Kit
${ModID}:PackmasterKit.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Rummage and *Cardistry to your hand. Exhaust.
